Class AdminDashboardCenterPanel

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.AdminDashboardCenterPanel
public class AdminDashboardCenterPanel extends Object
This class provides the main center panel UI for the Admin Dashboard. It includes user statistics (Admins, Teachers, Students), account creation stats, a welcome message with the admin's name, current date display, decorative images, and a right-side holidays panel.

  • Method Details

    • createPanel

      public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane createPanel()
      Creates and returns the main center panel Pane for the Admin Dashboard UI.

      The panel includes:

      • Background and decorative images
      • Welcome message with the current admin's full name
      • Current date display
      • User statistics for Admins, Teachers, Students
      • Number of accounts created by the current admin
      • A right-side panel showing a scrollable list of holidays

      Returns:
      a configured Pane containing all dashboard UI elements

    • createImageView

      private static javafx.scene.image.ImageView createImageView(String resourcePath, double width, double height, double x, double y)
      Creates an ImageView from a resource path with specified size and position.
      Parameters:
      resourcePath - the path to the image resource
      width - the desired width of the ImageView
      height - the desired height of the ImageView
      x - the X-coordinate for the ImageView's layout position
      y - the Y-coordinate for the ImageView's layout position
      Returns:
      an ImageView configured with the specified image, size, and position; returns an empty ImageView if the resource is not found
